site-address: Land at Snow Hill; Melton Mowbray

notes: Employment site, currently in use, principle of development acceptable subject to replacement employment land. MEL 11 contains 2 parcels of land, main parcel suitable for housing redevelopment (8.65ha); second  parcel on the opposite side of road (1ha0 for employment use. Pre-application advice, design review and community consultation undertaken by landowner for housing development in 2018. SHLAA ref MBC/0153/15
